title: "Study finds clean data platform boosts performance of Meta’s machine learning"
excerpt: "PureCars acquired the AutoMiner platform with the goal of giving dealers clean customer data to improve their marketing efforts. This week, the company released the results of a study in collaboration with Meta that tested the performance of dealership ads using AutoMiner’s data and Meta’s Advantage+ Audiences."
